review_blob: A soft weizen with tints of bannana flavour. However the taste does not go deep enough and reaches a flat pilzner more than a proper weize .
A little low on aromas, but wow such a nice amber coloured clear fresh hoppy and malt balanced tasteful beer with just the right amount of gas. Best swedish beer upto now...

Offcourse a bottle from the systembolaget in Stockholm, cooled in a hotelroom cocktailbar fridge. It looked nice and promising, placed in between the ipas and tripple. Nice top when poured, although it disappeared quite soon but that might have been the hotel wine glass. A tastefull little too hoppy afrertaste, I like an IPA full of hop but this doesnt fit the taste of the pilsner like beer. Smells really good somewhat fruity hops. First zips had typical cardboard-like, muffy bite, hence my rating. Have to say the last few zips were much better probably because the aftertaste now has fully taken over my taste and i am now expecting the worst.
beer_name: Brutal Brewing Hale To Nothing Eco Ale
